Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Colored with tinges of pink and lavender in the rising of the sun, Brilliant in the morning light, Basking under the noon sun at the apex of the sky,Reflecting the sun as it creeps toward the western horizon, Radiant with the orange and gold glint of sunset, Dark and shadowed, Cloaked in heavy and oppressive darkness, Cast in the deep darkness of the late night, the surface of the water spreads out in every direction in an undulating sweep of umbral aqua. Shifting incessantly with the rhythmic sweep of the unerring tides, the soft cadence of lapping water fills the area with continual sound as the salty brine of the ocean waters tinges every scent. In the distance to the north, the glittering lights of the city of Triskellian can be seen twinkling faintly in the dark. the blurry earth tones of the city-scape of Triskellian mark the pin-straight horizon line where the sky meets the water. {? | $(this.trait:geography) | $(this.trait:geography) }

Colored with tinges of pink and lavender in the rising of the sun, Brilliant in the morning light, Basking under the noon sun at the apex of the sky,Reflecting the sun as it creeps toward the western horizon, Radiant with the orange and gold glint of sunset,Dark and shadowed,Cloaked in heavy and oppressive darkness, Cast in the deep darkness of the late night, the surface of the water spreads out in every direction. {? | $(this.trait:geography) | $(this.trait:geography) }

The surface of the water, rippling and shifting with the sweep of the tides, stretches out around you. The reflections of the night sky are morphed and twisted by the ever-changing waters, the light from the sun stars glittering in prismatic flashes atop the peaks of the waves surrounding you. The salt-tinged air is damp with brine and alive with the scents of sea life, the soft susurration of waves an unending, rhythmic swish filling the area with constant sound. {? | $(this.trait:geography) | $(this.trait:geography) }
the inky water of the bay
The surface of the water is constantly shifting with the waves, it's depths turning it a dark inky color from above.
The horizon where sky meets water, broken only by a small smudge of land.
The surface of the water is constantly shifting with the waves.
The surface of the water is rippling and shifting with the flow of the waters.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \{ \ \{ The clang of ship bells rings out in the distance, echoing and dancing over the surface of the soft swish of the waves. \| A flock of seagulls swoops and swirls through the sky overhead. \| The rhythmic shifting of the waves fills the area with a continual whisper of sound. \| A series of cries is heard in the distance as a large ship maneuvers into position along the docks to the north. \| A large wake disturbs the otherwise mild tides as another large ship plies its way through the waters of the bay. \| A small fishing dinghy in the distance bobs atop the tide, its passengers singing out in unison as they pull their nets in time to the tune they share. \| The waters of the bay surrounding you are a chaotic dance of ships both large and small filtering in and out of the docks to the north. \| A cacophonous blare of jangling bells erupts from the docks in the distance to the north, a sailor crying out a warning as a large schooner begins to slowly back out of its spot at the pier. \| The clanging of a small ship bell in the distance is accompanied by the screeching call of a lone seagull, the bird coasting high above as it searches for scraps among the fishing vessels scattered around the surface of the bay. \| The salty brine taints the air with a scent that could only be described as fishy, the breeze wafting over the water damp and chilly regardless of the time of year. \} \ \} \{ \ \{ A large ship bobs in the distance, anchored in position as it waits for the dawn to pull into the docks. \| The clanging and clattering of the docks has silenced with the fall of dark, the only sound that surrounds you being the soft swish of the constant tide. \| Waves lap against your vessel as you rock rhythmically with the tides of the water. \| The high, shrill sound of a pea-whistle can be heard in the distance, the starkness of the sound cutting through the subdued serenity of the darkness around you. \| The lights of the city of Triskellian to the north dance and twinkle in the inky black night that blankets the surroundings. \| The glittering of faint lights dances along the black mirror surface of the waters of the bay. \| A large schooner bobs softly in the distance, its large mass held in position by its anchored chains, the massive vessel creaking softly as it shifts and rolls atop the tidal surface of the waters. \| A jovial tune rings out from a nearby ship, the sailors at anchor singing a merry song as they revel in the peace of the night. \| Black as the night that surrounds you, a small and speedy skiff suddenly darts out of the shadow and skates swiftly toward the docks in the distance, its passengers similarly cloaked in all black as they huddle low in the small vessel. \| For a brief moment, the breeze calms and the sounds of the night quiet, the impenetrable darkness and momentary silence settling over the surroundings with ominous heaviness. \} \ \} \}

A large schooner bobs softly in the distance, its large mass held in position by its anchored chains, the massive vessel creaking softly as it shifts and rolls atop the tidal surface of the waters. \| A jovial tune rings out from a nearby ship, the sailors at anchor singing a merry song as they revel in the peace of the night. \| Black as the night that surrounds you, a small and speedy skiff
